text: Lalji Tandon (12 April 1935 - 21 July 2020) was an Indian politician. He was the 22nd Governor of Madhya Pradesh from July 2019 to June 2020. He was a member of Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). He was a protégé of Atal Bihari Vajpayee. Tandon was hospitalized in June 2020 for a urinary tract infection.Madhya Pradesh Governor Lalji Tandon hospitalised He died on 21 July 2020 in Lucknow, aged 85.Madhya Pradesh Governor Lalji Tandon dies ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Lucknow Category:Governors of Madhya Pradesh Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Lalji Tandon
